alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison, southeastern Limestone and northeastern Morgan Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huntsville International Airport and Madison. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy downpours reducing visibility and rainfall of 1 to 2 inches in less than an hour. Brief wind gusts of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel due to ponding of water and minor street flooding is likely. Locations impacted include... Southern Huntsville, Madison, Redstone Arsenal, Marshall Space Flight Center, Huntsville International Airport, University Of Alabama In Huntsville and Belle Mina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
